alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 05 at 12:36AM PST until February 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Western Mojave Desert and Eastern Mojave Desert. In Nevada, the Spring Mountains, Red Rock Canyon, southern Nye County, Las Vegas Valley, southern Clark County, and western Clark County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
